item.description:
Last year the Aussie meetup group combined with the Canadian meetup group for our Christmas party and it was so much fun we have decided to do it again.

This years party will be held at Kings on Friday 14th December from 7.30 pm. Kings has bar, music, pool tables and even a bowling alley and I'm sure those who came along last year will agree a good time was had by all.

Hope you can make it, please bring your freinds, everyone is welcome.

Cheers,
Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Aussie/Canadian group Xmas Party
